body.name: Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs, Fresh Scent, 85 Count (Previously Solimo)
features: Dishwasher detergent in pre-measured dish pacs (85-count)
2-in-1 grease fighting and rinse aid for a sparkling clean without residue
Amazon brand degreasing and Oxi stain-fighting formula for a virtually spotless clean
Fights even the hardest 24-hour stuck-on foods and other stubborn messes
If you like Cascade Dishwasher Pods, we invite you to try Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs
body.description: Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs combine grease-fighting detergent and rinse aid into a dishwasher pod. It comes in convenient packaging and is easy to use for a hassle-free dishwashing experience. The fresh scented dish soap pac leaves dishes sparkling clean. With its improved pac fit in your dishwasher, it allows for easy close of the lid. For best results use one pac per wash, handle with dry hands, and ensure dishwasher soap tray is dry before placing in the pac. Do not unwrap or puncture the dishwasher detergent pac. It's always a good idea to have well-stocked dishwashing supplies at home. Running low? Use your Echo device or Alexa on the Amazon app to reorder by voice. Just say “Alexa, reorder Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs.” Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs 85 Washloads A purchase of Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs will help get your dishes sparkling clean with a Fresh Scent for 85 washloads Tough on Residue Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs offer 2-in-1 grease fighting and rinse aid to give you a sparkling clean without residue No Pre-Rinse Needed Save Time and get your dishes clean using Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs that fight 24-hour stuck-on food with no pre-rinse needed Powerful Formula Every premeasured dish pod is filled with the Amazon Brand’s powerful degreasing and oxi stain-fighting formula or a virtually spotless clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was hesitant to buy these, but they've been great!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to get these and when I first saw them, I was worried. They don't look as nice as some of the other dishwasher detergent packs you can get at the store, but they are a really good price and so convenient. I've done several loads of dishes and am happy to say that they do a great job! They clean the dishes, don't leave streaks, and don't make a mess in my dishwasher. Very happy with them and I'll be ordering them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dishwasher detergent
reviews.reviewText: I keep coming back for this. I have tried other ones, but this is the only dishwasher pod I can tolerate. I feel like all of the others are more expensive and leave more residue. Only set back is that they will stick together if left sitting in a damp area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works as well as any name brand pods I’ve used before. However, it came with a clump of about 8 stuck together and they just break and become unusable when trying to separate them. So that’s a bummer but overall I think I’d buy them again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unwrap a World of Simple, Sparkling Clean!
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: Amazon Basics triumphs again with budget-friendly, effective dishwasher detergent pods. Who needs fancy brands?In the thrilling saga of finding bang-for-your-buck household products, Amazon Basics stands out like a superhero in a world of overpriced caped crusaders. Their dishwasher detergent pods are the latest in my lineup of affordable, quality finds. "Fresh scent"? Please, it's like worrying about the brand of air we breathe – totally irrelevant. I barely notice it, and that's the beauty of it.These pods are the epitome of convenience. Forget about the days of wrestling with packaging or measuring out liquid or powder. It's like playing a game of dishwasher basketball – just shoot a pod straight into the dishwasher's belly. No need for the fancy footwork of placing it in the dispenser.And let's talk about their stick-to-itiveness, or lack thereof – these pods don't clump together like a group of awkward teenagers at a dance. They dissolve like a dream, leaving no trace but cleanliness. Plus, they're like a gentle giant to your septic system.The result? Sparkling dishes and pots, no residue in sight. It's a dishwasher detergent that does its job without the fuss and feathers of a name brand. In a world where we're often dazzled by labels, Amazon Basics reminds us that sometimes, the real treasure lies in simplicity and efficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for Dishes
reviews.reviewText: These pods are simple and work great on dishes. Kind of hard to open the box but still well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Basics Dishwasher Detergent Pacs, Fresh Scent, 85 Count
reviews.reviewText: Why pay for a name brand? I love Amazon Basics. In almost every case, Amazon Basics delivers quality at a bargain price. This dishwasher detergent is no exception. The "fresh scent" is of no concern. Frankly I don't even notice - who cares, right? These pods are convenient - no unwrapping or pouring - you just toss one in. I don't bother even putting it in the dispenser. I just toss it in the bottom of the dishwasher. They don't stick together in the container, they fully dissolve during the cycle, they are septic system safe, they get your dishes/pot & pans clean. What's not to love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well, but bunches together
reviews.reviewText: It seems to clean well and I love that it’s unscented BUT the pods stick together in the package. About half of the package was stuck together and when you pull them apart they break, getting soap powder everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than cascade and a better price!
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well and no weird smell afterwords like others
